ZDO_NwkAddrReq_t Struct Reference

This request is generated from a Local Device wishing to inquire as to the 16-bit address of the Remote Device based on its known IEEE address. The destination addressing on this command shall be unicast or broadcast to all devices for which macRxOnWhenIdle = TRUE. More...

#include <zdo.h>


Data Fields

ExtAddr_t ieeeAddrOfInterest
uint8_t reqType
uint8_t startIndex

Detailed Description

This request is generated from a Local Device wishing to inquire as to the 16-bit address of the Remote Device based on its known IEEE address. The destination addressing on this command shall be unicast or broadcast to all devices for which macRxOnWhenIdle = TRUE.

Definition at line 401 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t ZDO_NwkAddrReq_t::ieeeAddrOfInterest

The IEEE address to be matched by the Remote Device

Definition at line 404 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_NwkAddrReq_t::reqType

Request type for this command: 0x00 Single device response 0x01 Extended response 0x02-0xFF reserved

Definition at line 409 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_NwkAddrReq_t::startIndex

If the Request type for this command is Extended response, the StartIndex provides the starting index for the requested elements of the associated devices list
